body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Greenfield, Massachusetts native. Married to Margaret Breckenridge Ripley in Washington, D. C. in 1859. Attorney at Ripley & Thompson in partnership with William K. Thompson in Louisville in 1861. Elected to the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from the 15th Senatorial District in 1856.
